title: Afghanistan: In a quiet valley the Taliban face armed resistance
description: Small groups of guerrillas, led by soldiers from the former Afghan army, have been taking on the Taliban.

title: In one of the poorest slums in Argentina, families rely on a huge landfill site for food.
description: In one of the poorest slums in Argentina, hundreds of families rely on a huge landfill site to feed their children.

title: 'As CEO, my job is to get out of their way'
description: Vineeta Singh, boss of Indian firm SUGAR Cosmetics, shares her business advice.

title: The gadget that sucks ink off paper
description: With the 'de-printer' specially coated sheets of paper can be used 10 times over.

title: London 2012: Desiree Henry's role in spectacular opening & a legacy to be defined
description: Ten years on from London 2012, Desiree Henry recalls the clandestine operation behind a spectacular opening ceremony.

title: Euro 2022: England in perfect position to land elusive trophy
description: England's 4-0 demolition of Sweden wipes out the curse of losing three successive semi-finals to reach Sunday's final at Wembley.

title: Euro 2022: Is women's football coming home?
description: People across the country have been celebrating as England beat Sweden 4-0 in the Euro 2022 semi-final.

title: Euro 2022: England secure place in final with victory over Sweden - highlights
description: Watch highlights as England reach the final of Euro 2022 by thrashing Sweden 4-0 at Bramall Lane.

title: England 4-0 Sweden at Euro 2022: 'Is this real? Someone pinch me' asks Scott
description: Alex Scott says "everyone involved in women's football has been waiting for this" as England hammer Sweden 4-0 at Bramall Lane to reach the Euro 2022 final.

title: Euro 2022: Watch all the angles of Alessia Russo cheeky backheel against Sweden
description: Watch all the angles as Alessia Russo scores a stunning backheel to put England 3-0 up against Sweden in their Euro 2022 semi-final at Bramall Lane.

title: Germany v France in Euro 2022: Klara Buhl ruled out of semi-final with Covid
description: Winger Klara Buhl is ruled out of Germany's Euro 2022 semi-final against France after testing positive for Covid.

title: BBC footage reveals abuse of disabled Ukrainians
description: Widespread abuse of disabled children and adults exposed in BBC investigation.

title: Commonwealth Games 2022: Who are the home nation athletes to watch at Birmingham 2022?
description: BBC Sport highlights the key athletes to watch at the Birmingham 2022 Commonwealth Games from across the home nations.

title: Mercury Prize: All you need to know about this year's nominees
description: The shortlist includes Harry Styles, Sam Fender, Little Simz, Wet Leg, Self Esteem and Nova Twins.

title: Heathrow hits back at 'bizarre' Ryanair criticism
description: The boss of the UK's largest airport says Ryanair is wrong to blame airports for travel disruption.

title: David Trimble: Bill Clinton hails him a 'leader of courage'
description: Lord Trimble, who died aged 77, was instrumental in negotiating the Good Friday Agreement in 1998.

title: EU agrees to cut gas use over Russia supply fears
description: EU members agree to voluntarily reduce gas use by 15%, but some members can seek exemptions.

title: Eurovision: Bucks Fizz star backs Cardiff to host 2023 event
description: Former winner Cheryl Baker made the suggestion after another winner, Lulu, made a shout for Glasgow.

title: Czech forest fire smoke drifts across country
description: People have been told to keep windows closed as the smell of smoke spreads to many areas.

title: Former United States goalkeeper Hope Solo pleads guilty to driving while impaired
description: Former United States goalkeeper Hope Solo pleads guilty to driving while impaired and says she is "slowly coming back" following an in-patient alcohol treatment programme.

title: Freya the 600kg walrus causes a stir in Norway
description: The young female marine mammal has been spotted clambering onto boats to doze in the summer sun.

title: Amazon Prime subscription price raised by £1 a month
description: The £1-a-month rise comes after years in which the streaming service paid millions for football rights.

title: Myanmar executions: US urges China to condemn Myanmar
description: However China's foreign ministry says it does not interfere in other nations' internal affairs.

title: Wildfire tears through homes in Texas
description: At least 20 properties have been destroyed by the fire in Balch Springs, as the US battles extreme heat.

title: Historic pride jersey sparks player boycott in Australia
description: Seven National Rugby League players say jerseys promoting LGBT inclusivity contradict their beliefs.

title: Laura Nuttall presents weather in cancer bucket list challenge
description: Laura Nuttall, who has brain cancer, joins Owain Wyn Evans to present BBC North West Tonight's weather.

title: Euro 2022: Leah Williamson's mum talks matchday nerves
description: Leah Williamson's mum Amanda says watching Euros games can feel as stressful as being on the pitch.

title: 'If you think energy bills are bad now, worse is to come'
description: A committee of MPs says cost-of-living payments should reflect higher than anticipated energy bills.

title: Euro 2022: Watch every England goal so far in 60 seconds
description: Watch every England goal so far at Euro 2022 with spectacular shots displaying both individual brilliance and teamwork as we await their semi-final fixture against Sweden.

title: Tomohiro Kato: Japan executes Akihabara mass murderer, say reports
description: Tomohiro Kato was 25 when he killed seven people in a busy Tokyo shopping district in 2008.

title: Commonwealth Games 2022: Tom Dean and Kem Cetinay play Top Trunks
description: Double Olympic champion Tom Dean and TV personality Kem Cetinay play a game of Top Trunks.

title: Mason: No knockout blows, but Sunak is short of time
description: This was an energetic debate in which the disagreements were stark, but Rishi Sunak needs momentum - and soon

title: Euro 2022: Who made your England semi-final team to face Sweden?
description: Hosts England are into the semi-finals of the Euros, but who made your XI to face Sweden?

title: Euro 2022: How Sweden can hurt England in semi-final
description: Arsenal manager Jonas Eidevall discusses how his home nation Sweden could hurt England in their Euro 2022 semi-final.

title: Euro 2022: 'There is genuine belief Lionesses can end wait to reach a final'
description: England are preparing for a fourth successive semi-final at a women's major tournament - but this time it feels different as a sense of optimism follows Sarina Wiegman's side.

title: The nine-year-old growing up in a circus
description: Talia Hawker and daughter Safiyah have lived in the circus since the nine-year-old was born

title: A1(M) Bowburn crash: Three-death smash remembered a year on
description: The BBC hears from some of those involved in a fatal crash caused by a lorry driver using his phone.

title: Alcohol deaths from pandemic drinking are predicted to rise
description: Forecasters say heavy home drinking in England is to blame - but it's not too late to address the issue.

title: How pop singer Dylan turned her Latitude disaster into triumph
description: The singer was at last year's festival when she learned her boyfriend was cheating on her - but it inspired her
